biotools.summary: This high power, high conservativeness of FDR estimation and high stability method is suit-able to transcriptomic data, tag data, SAGE data (count data) from small samples or a few replicate libraries. It can be used to identify genes, mRNA isoforms or tags differentially expressed between two conditions.

bioschemas.name: MBttest
